titles: The unfortunate lover; or, Merry Andrew's sad and wofull [sic] lamentation for the loss of his sweetheart Joan. To the tune of, I marry and thank ye too. Licensed according to order.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby. J. Deacon. J. Blare. J. Back.,
notes: Place and Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Alas I am come to town ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Broadsides --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
